page.title: 10TAXIS, KINGSTON
page.content: A taxi can carry four passengers. The car is for hire in the street. The driver needs a special licence to drive a taxi and expert knowledge of routes. English taxis are black but some are other colours. There is a taxi rank outside kingston station. On the roof of the taxi there is a sign saying {"For hire".}When the taxi is taking on passengers the driver turns off the light. The passengers sit facing one an other. There is plenty of room. Inside a whole family can fit together. The price is shown on the meter and is a standard price for each mile. The driver is allowed to charge extra for each person and piece of luggage. It costs Â£8 to go to Paddington Â£9 to Gatwick and Â£7 to Heathow Airport.
